TopicTitle: MIR Station craft files for Bobcats Soviet Pack

Articles.Content:
Well....

Correct forums now..

Well I took all night to develop the craft files for the MIR space station for use with Bobcats Soviet Historical Pack.

Space Port Link

-temporarily down-

This is in no way my development, but since bobcat deleted all the .craft files I thought it would be great for the community to have them all prebuilt with correct RCS, solar panels, and the proton launcher.

Every Module is tested with MechJeb 2.0

Right now the pack includes:

SPH

MIR Station assembled (suggested by DarthVader)

VAB

-Mir Core

-Kvant 1

-Kvant 2

-Kristal

-Spektr

-Priroda

All are on the Proton Launcher.

None of the craft files will work without Bobcats original Soviet Pack listed below

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/soyuz-pack-1-0/

Video of final product and announcement here

http://youtu.be/PBz8ZtuXOeI

Stay tuned to my channel as I believe I am going to try and reproduce all the .craft files for bobcats mods. Again this is not taking credit for his work but having craft files put together from his mods.

Ones to come

ISS Community with Proton launcher or Buran

H.O.M.E. 2 project with different landing module set ups probably all using the Ares V launcher from the American Pack.

Edited September 30, 2013 by stupid_chris
temparaily removed download link until it includes attribution for the part
Do you have .craft for the entire thing? If so I can send you one I made, if you credit me with the building of course.

Do you have .craft for the entire thing? If so I can send you one I made, if you credit me with the building of course.

I do but did not upload that. Guessing people that want to hyper edit it up.

I will add that right now. Thanks for the idea.
Can you fix it where files don't have the MIR Launch Probe, as BobCat didn't include that specific part in his latest Soviet Pack release.

The pack I just downloaded for spaceport has the MIR launch probe; unless you mean the MIR ASAS module.

But let me know if something does not work and I will recreate them best I can.

Also if you guys have any suggestions let me know, more than willing to try and put things together.

I am not a moder so bare with me
every time i try to load both MIR files I get , "Can't load due to missing part-MIR Launch Probe" and I have the latest pack installed.

every time i try to load both MIR files I get , "Can't load due to missing part-MIR Launch Probe" and I have the latest pack installed.

well have no idea how that happened. Do not get how I had it, just looked in the pack and you are 100 % correct it is not there.

Had to unistall and now redoing all mods. Let me see if I can find the issue.

Is this just on the MIR craft file in the SPH or all of them?
both MIR craft files in VAB and the complete MIR file in SPH

well have no idea how that happened. Do not get how I had it, just looked in the pack and you are 100 % correct it is not there.

Had to unistall and now redoing all mods. Let me see if I can find the issue.

Is this just on the MIR craft file in the SPH or all of them?both MIR craft files in VAB and the complete MIR file in SPH

Yes I just reinstalled it, both MIR craft files in the VAB, and the complete MIR file in SPH

Yes I just reinstalled it, both MIR craft files in the VAB, and the complete MIR file in SPH

Okay I found the issue.

The MIR PROBE is in the American Pack or the ISS pack

Either way I did the easiest fix possible and included the MIR PROBE part.

Just drop it in one of the part folders for Bobcat.

Easier than recreating all the .craft files

Any other issues please let me know.
Would you guys also like craft files for the HOME 2 modules?
